Reviews.Content: stayed tech madrid 2 nights returning san francisco promised exactly hotel situated block metro station ciudad visit prado thyssen museums total 8 stops transfer middle museums free onsite parking parking checked street parking close unrestricted free wifi included notebook computer close airport leaving soon hiccups visiting experience notebook computer booking promised bottle wine check wine own notebook unable connect wifi connected lan cable liked hotel staff hiccups 5 5

Reviews.Title: “Adequate hotel for business trip - but lacking character”
Reviews.Author: Sinbad02
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located business trip 1015 minutes drive airport meals served hotel charming restaurant 5 minutes walking distance hotel called la cocina size stay peaceful bought own laptop print code free internet access bathroom cheaplooking plastic unit corner shower time water massager apart delivering harsh jet water shower head relaxing spray breakfast adequate worth 22 euros extra cost total paid 1 night hotel fine probably look alternative time
